74911.en:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>Okay, I got it. A monster appeared in
Garial Cave in the Gran Zedora
Territory?<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74911.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>「……よし　わかった。
　グランゼドーラ領にある　ガリアル洞に
　魔物が　現れたんだな？<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74911.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>: ……그래, 알았다.
　그랑제도라령에 있는 가리알 동굴에
　마물이 나타났단 말이지?<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74911.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>……好，我明白了。
古兰泽朵拉领土的加利亚尔洞
出现了怪物对吧？<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74911.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>……好，我知道了。
古蘭澤朵拉領土內的加利亞爾洞
有怪物出現對吧？<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>

74912.en:
<start_lip_sync n02389 _normal m00001>Yes, I have. The report said it was a
fearsome monster, not seen around
here.<stop_lip_animation n02389 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74912.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02389 _normal m00001>「はい。この辺りでは見かけない
　恐ろしい魔物と　報告にありました。<stop_lip_animation n02389 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74912.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02389 _normal m00001>: 네. 이 주변에서는 보기 힘든
　무서운 마물이라는 보고가 있었습니다.<stop_lip_animation n02389 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74912.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02389 _normal m00001>是的。报告称是附近
从没见过的恐怖怪物。<stop_lip_animation n02389 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74912.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02389 _normal m00001>是的，報告說那是不會出現在
這一帶的可怕怪物。<stop_lip_animation n02389 CLOSE_MOUTH>

74913.en:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>First of all, I'm going to clean up
the monster that was reported earlier.
I can't be in two places at once.<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74913.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>「まずは　先に報告のあった魔物を
　片付けに　向かうとするか。
　同時に　ふたつの場所には行けないからな。<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74913.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>: 우선 먼저 보고가 있었던 마물을
　처리하러 가야겠군.
　동시에 두 장소를 갈 수는 없으니까.<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74913.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>总之先去处理
之前报告中的怪物吧。
毕竟不能同时去两个地方。<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74913.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>先去解決報告中的
怪物吧。
畢竟沒辦法同時去兩個地方。<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>

74914.en:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>Oh, <pc>. I really appreciate
you saving me when I was down and out.<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74914.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>「おお　<pc>じゃないか。
　行き倒れていたオレを　救ってくれたこと
　本当に　感謝している。<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74914.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>: 오오, <pc>.
　쓰러져 있던 날 구해 줘서
　정말 고맙다.<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74914.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>哦哦，这不是<pc>嘛。
真的很感谢你当时
救了倒下的我。<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74914.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>喔，這不是<pc>嗎？
真的很感謝你救了不支倒地的我。<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>

74915.en:
After that, I thought to myself, ''What can I do for this kingdom? I've been thinking about what I can do for this
kingdom. But I'm only a swordsman.
74915.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>「……あれから　オレは考えたんだ。
　この王国のために　できることはないかって。
　だが　オレは　ただの剣士でしかない。<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74915.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>: ……그 후로 난 생각했지.
　이 왕국을 위해 할 수 있는 일이 없을까 하고.
　하지만 난 일개 검사에 불과해.<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74915.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>……那之后我一直在思考
我究竟能为王国做些什么。
但我只是个剑士。<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74915.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>……在那之後我思考過，
我能為這王國做些什麼。
但我只是名劍士。<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>

74916.en:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>I can only use my sword to exterminate
the monsters that terrorize people. If
only I had more power.<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74916.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>「この剣のウデを活かし　人々をおびやかす魔物を
　退治してまわるのが　せいぜいなのさ。
　オレに　もっと　チカラがあれば……。<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74916.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>: 사람들을 괴롭히는 마물을 이 검술로
　퇴치하고 다니는 게 고작이야.
　나에게 좀 더 힘이 있었더라면…….<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74916.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>充其量只能用我的剑术
讨伐那些危害人们的怪物。
如果我有更多力量的话……<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74916.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>我頂多只能運用劍術，
打倒威脅人群的怪物。
要是我有更多的力量……<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>

74917.en:
<start_lip_sync n02071 _normal m00001>No such thing, Tegram, the people are
watching you.<stop_lip_animation n02071 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74917.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02071 _normal m00001>「そのようなことはないぞ　テグラム。
　国民たちは　お前の活躍に注目しておる。<stop_lip_animation n02071 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74917.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02071 _normal m00001>: 그렇지 않네, 테그람.
　국민들은 자네의 활약을 주목하고 있어.<stop_lip_animation n02071 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74917.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02071 _normal m00001>才不是这样的，提古拉姆。
国民们很关注你的活跃表现。<stop_lip_animation n02071 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74917.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02071 _normal m00001>沒這回事，提古拉姆，
國民們都很關注你的表現。<stop_lip_animation n02071 CLOSE_MOUTH>

74918.en:
That's right! Some are beginning to say that Tegram is the second coming of the hero princess. She may be the
new leader of this kingdom!
74918.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02389 _normal m00001>「そうです！　テグラムさまは　勇者姫の
　再来と言う者も　出はじめているのですよ。
　この王国の　新たな指導者なのではないかと！<stop_lip_animation n02389 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74918.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02389 _normal m00001>: 맞습니다! 테그람 님은 용사 공주의
　재림이라는 사람들도 나오기 시작했어요.
　이 왕국의 새로운 지도자가 아니냐고요!<stop_lip_animation n02389 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74918.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02389 _normal m00001>没错！已经有人说
提古拉姆大人是勇者公主再世了。
说你可能是这个王国新的领导者！<stop_lip_animation n02389 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74918.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02389 _normal m00001>
是啊！甚至還有些人說
提古拉姆大人是勇者公主的轉世。
說你可能是這個王國新的領導者！<stop_lip_animation n02389 CLOSE_MOUTH>

74919.en:
I see. I know it's presumptuous of me to be a leader, but if what I do is what everyone wants, Grandpa will be
happy.
74919.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>「そうか……。指導者なんて　おこがましいが
　オレのやることが　皆の希望になるのなら
　じいさんも　よろこんでくれるだろう。<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74919.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>: 그렇군……. 지도자란 말은 터무니없지만
　내가 하는 일이 모두에게 희망을 준다면
　할아버지도 기뻐하시겠지.<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74919.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>是吗……领导者什么的实在是太抬举我了，
不过如果我所做的事能给大家带来希望，
爷爷应该也会高兴的吧。<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74919.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>這樣啊……說領導者太厚臉皮了，
但我的作為若能為大家帶來希望，
爺爺也會很開心的吧。<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>

74920.en:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>I'll do what I can. Now, if you'll
excuse me.<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74920.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>「オレは　オレに　できることをしようと思う。
　では　これで　失礼する。<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74920.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>: 난 내가 할 수 있는 일을 하려고 해.
　그럼 이만 실례하마.<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74920.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>我要去做我能做到的事。
那么我先告辞了。<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74920.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>我要去做我能做到的事。
那我先離開了。<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>

74921.en:
<start_lip_sync n02389 _normal m00001>Now that I have finished my report, I
will leave you.<stop_lip_animation n02389 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74921.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02389 _normal m00001>「報告は　終わりましたので
　私も　失礼いたします。<stop_lip_animation n02389 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74921.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02389 _normal m00001>: 보고를 마쳤으니
　저도 이만 가보겠습니다.<stop_lip_animation n02389 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74921.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02389 _normal m00001>报告结束了，
我也先告辞了。<stop_lip_animation n02389 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74921.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02389 _normal m00001>我已報告完畢，
所以也先告辭了。<stop_lip_animation n02389 CLOSE_MOUTH>

74922.en:
I'll get back to Mayor Baffle for a
report.
74922.ja:
テグラムから　話を聞くことができた。
バッフル町長の所へ　報告に戻ろう。
74922.ko:
테그람의 이야기를 들었다.
바플 촌장에게 보고하러 돌아가자.
74922.zh-Hans:
已得知提古拉姆的想法。
回去向巴福尔镇长报告吧。
74922.zh-Hant:
已得知提古拉姆的想法了。
回巴福爾鎮長那邊報告吧。

74924.en:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>Oh, so this is the evil monster! Well,
he certainly has a fearsome face.<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74924.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>「おお　こいつが　凶悪な魔物か！
　なるほど　確かに　恐ろしいカオをしておるわ。<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74924.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>: 오오, 이 녀석이 흉악한 마물인가!
　역시 무섭게 생겼군그래.<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74924.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>哦哦，这家伙就是凶恶的怪物吗！
原来如此，样子确实相当恐怖啊。<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74924.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>喔喔，這傢伙就是凶惡的怪物啊！
原來如此，的確長著一張很可怕的臉。<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>

74925.en:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>But if I can defeat the evil monster
on Tegram's behalf, my reputation will
rise in the years to come!<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74925.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>「だが　テグラムに代わり
　凶悪な魔物を　倒してやったとなれば
　遠からず　わしの評判も　うなぎ登り！<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74925.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>: 하지만 테그람을 대신해서
　흉악한 마물을 쓰러뜨려 해치우면
　머지않아 내 평판도 하늘을 찌르겠지!<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74925.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>但如果我代替提古拉姆
打倒了凶恶的怪物，
不久之后我的评价也会水涨船高！<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74925.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>但要是我能取代提古拉姆，
打倒凶狠怪物的話，
不久後，我的評價也會水漲船高！<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>

74923.ja: <start_lip_sync m14504 _normal m00001>「グゥルルルルゥ……。<stop_lip_animation m14504 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74923.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync m14504 _normal m00001>咕呜呜呜……<stop_lip_animation m14504 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74923.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync m14504 _normal m00001>咕嚕嚕嚕嚕……<stop_lip_animation m14504 CLOSE_MOUTH>

74926.en:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>Go on, travelers! I'll be watching
from the shadows!<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74926.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>「よし　行け　旅の者よ！
　わしは　こっそり　陰から見ているからな！<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74926.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>: 좋아, 가 보게! 여행자!
　난 그늘에 숨어서 보고 있겠네!<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74926.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>好，上吧旅行者！
我会躲起来看着的！<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74926.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>好，上吧，旅人啊！
我會悄悄躲在暗處觀看的！<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>

74927.ja: <start_lip_sync m14504 _normal m00001>「アンギャーーー！！<stop_lip_animation m14504 CLOSE_MOUTH>

74928.en:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>O traveller! You have done a terrible
thing to run away without me!<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74928.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>「……旅の者よ！
　わしを置いて　逃げるとは
　ひどいではないか！！<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74928.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>: ……여행자!
　날 두고 도망치다니
　너무하는 거 아닌가!?<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74928.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>……旅行者！
竟然扔下我自己跑掉，
太过分了吧！！<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74928.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>……旅人啊！
竟然丟下我逃走，
太過分了吧！！<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>

74929.en:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>This time, I want you to bring this
vicious monster to justice. For the
sake of my reputation!<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74929.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>「今度こそ　この凶悪な魔物を　しとめてくれ。
　わしの評判のためにな！<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74929.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>: 이번에야말로 이 흉악한 마물을 해치우게.
　내 평판을 위해서 말이야!<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74929.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>这次一定要干掉那个凶恶的怪物啊。
为了我的评价！<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74929.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>這次要解決這隻凶惡的怪物。
為了提升我的評價！<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>

74930.ja: <start_lip_sync m14504 _normal m00001>「アンギャーーー！！<stop_lip_animation m14504 CLOSE_MOUTH>

74931.en:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>You see that, monster? I won't let you
do what you want while my eyes are
black!<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74931.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>「見たか　魔物め！
　わしの目の黒いうちは　好きにはさせんぞ！<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74931.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>: 봤냐, 이 마물아!
　내가 살아 있는 한, 네 뜻대로는 안 될 거다!<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74931.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>看到了吗臭怪物！
只要我还活着就不会让你胡作非为！<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74931.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>看到了吧，臭怪物！
只要我還活著，我就不會讓你亂來！<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>

74932.en:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>Wow. Defeating this monster is really
something, isn't it?<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74932.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>「ほう……。
　この魔物を倒すなんて　やるじゃないか。<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74932.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>: 호오…….
　이 마물을 쓰러뜨리다니 제법이군.<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74932.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>哦……
竟能打倒这个怪物，你还挺厉害嘛。<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74932.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>喔……
竟然可以打倒這個怪物，很厲害嘛。<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>

74933.en:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>Oh, this is Tegram. I know this is a
bit of a nuisance, but I ordered this
man to exterminate you!<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74933.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>「おお　これはテグラム殿。
　おせっかいかとは思いましたが
　わしが　この者に命じて　退治させたのですぞ！<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74933.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>: 오오, 이거 테그람 씨.
　괜한 참견일까 싶기도 했지만
　내가 이 자를 시켜서 먼저 퇴치했습니다!<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74933.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>哦哦，是提古拉姆啊。
虽然是有些多管闲事，
但我已命这个人讨伐完毕了！<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74933.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>喔喔，是提古拉姆閣下。
雖然有些多管閒事，
不過我已命令這個人打倒怪物了！<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>

74934.en:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>That's what I'm talking about.<cs_pchero>I guess I didn't have to go out there.
It seems I didn't have to go out
there.<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74934.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>「さすがだな　<cs_pchero>。
　オレが出向く必要は　なかったようだ。<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74934.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>: 굉장한걸, <cs_pchero>.
　내가 나설 필요가 없었던 모양이야.<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74934.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>不愧是<cs_pchero>。
看来我没必要跑这一趟嘛。<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74934.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>厲害啊，<cs_pchero>。
看來似乎不需要我出場了。<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>

74935.ja: <start_lip_sync m14504 _normal m00001>「アンギャアーッ！！<stop_lip_animation m14504 CLOSE_MOUTH>

74936.ja: <start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>「うっひょえ～っ！？<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>

74937.en:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>Oh, Mr. Tegram, no, Mr. Tegram! You
saved my life!<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74937.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>「おおぉ　テグラム殿……いえ　テグラムさま！
　おかげで　わしの命が　助かりましたぁ！<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74937.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>: 오오, 테그람 씨…… 아니, 테그람 님!
　덕분에 제가 목숨을 건졌습니다!<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74937.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>哦哦，提古拉姆……不，提古拉姆大人！
您救了我的命啊！<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74937.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>喔喔，提古拉姆閣下……不，是提古拉姆大人！
多虧有你，我才能得救！<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>

74938.en:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>I don't want dangerous monsters in my
country. That's all.<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74938.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>「オレの国に　こんな危険な魔物はいらない。
　それだけのことさ……。<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74938.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>: 우리 나라에 이런 위험한 마물이
　있을 곳은 없어.
　그게 전부다…….<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74938.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>我的国家不需要这种危险的怪物。
仅此而已……<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74938.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>我的國家不需要這種危險的怪物。
就只是這樣而已……<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>

74939.en:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>After all, you are the one who leads
the Gran Zedora Kingdom! I will follow
you for the rest of my life!<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74939.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>「やはり　あなたこそが
　グランゼドーラ王国を　導くお方！
　わしはもう　一生　ついていきますぞぅ！！<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74939.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>: 역시 당신이야말로
　그랑제도라 왕국을 이끄실 분!
　평생 당신을 따르겠습니다!!<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74939.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>果然您才是
要领导古兰泽朵拉王国的人！
我这一辈子都要追随您！！<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74939.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>果然你才是能夠
帶領古蘭澤朵拉王國的人！
我一輩子都會跟隨你的！！<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>

74940.en:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>I have made my decision. I will lead
Gran Zedora Kingdom.<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74940.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>「……オレは　決めたぞ。
　グランゼドーラ王国は　このオレが導く。<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74940.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>: ……난 결심했다.
　그랑제도라 왕국은 내가 이끌겠어.<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74940.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>……我决定了。
古兰泽朵拉王国由我来领导。<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74940.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>……我決定了。
由我來帶領古蘭澤朵拉王國。<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>

74941.en:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>Gran Zedora Kingdom will be reborn. I
will make it happen.<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74941.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>「グランゼドーラ王国を　生まれ変わらせる。
　……絶対に　成しとげてみせよう。<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74941.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>: 그랑제도라 왕국을 다시 태어나게 할 거다.
　……반드시 이뤄 내고 말겠어.<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74941.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>我一定……
要让古兰泽朵拉王国获得重生。<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74941.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02740 _normal m00001>我要讓古蘭澤朵拉王國重生。
……我絕對會做到的。<stop_lip_animation n02740 CLOSE_MOUTH>

74942.en:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>Traveler. I am returning with Tegram.
You may come to my house later. I have
prepared for you a reward.<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74942.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>「旅の者。わしは　テグラムさまと共に帰る。
　そなたは　後ほど　わしの家に来るがよい。
　礼を用意してあるのでな。<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74942.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>: 여행자, 난 테그람 님과 함께 돌아가마.
　자네는 나중에 내 집으로 와.
　답례를 준비해 놓을 테니까.<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74942.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>旅行者，我要和提古拉姆大人一同回去。
你稍后到我家去吧，
我已经给你准备好谢礼了。<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74942.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>旅人啊，我和提古拉姆大人一起回去。
你之後再來我家就好。
謝禮已經準備好了。<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>

74943.en: <start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>Tegram-sama, please wait for me!<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74943.ja: <start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>「テグラムさま　お待ちくださぃ～。<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74943.ko: <start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>: 테그람 님~ 같이 가요~<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74943.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>提古拉姆大人～等等我～<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74943.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n02318 _normal m00001>提古拉姆大人，請等一下～～<stop_lip_animation n02318 CLOSE_MOUTH>
